Hi This is Loklak üêÆ bot help 
 Type /search [query] in order to search and retrieve tweets 
Type /start in order to get a start message from the bot
Type /help to access this help
Type /anon to be anonymous
Disclaimer: We store your id in order to maintain a session if you want to be anonymous type /anon
or after you complete browsing type /delete to delete your data
Extra: The / slash is recommended but optional
